alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:23PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 17 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible at times tonight into Saturday morning, especially along Lake Superior. Additional lake enhanced to lake effect snow is expected Saturday night into Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
